articles.title: Friendship Meeting for Staff Members of Chinese Embassy Held
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting for Staff Members of Chinese Embassy Held
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday arranged a friendship meeting for staff members of the Chinese embassy here on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Present there on invitation were Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Minister Ri Kil Song and other officials of the Foreign Ministry.

articles.title: Public Presentation of Noble Virtues of Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Held
articles.content:
Public Presentation of Noble Virtues of Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Held
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea held a public presentation of noble virtues of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu at the People's Palace of Culture Friday on the occasion of significant February 8, birthday of the regular revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the women's union, officials of the union and its members in the city.
					
					 Performers there said that the foundation of the regular revolutionary armed forces on February 8, Juche 37 (1948) was a significant event that offered an opportunity for a new turn in building the revolutionary armed forces that started on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of self-reliance imbued by President Kim Il Sung provided a firm guarantee for successfully building the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The Korean People's Army which had grown to be the invincible regular armed forces under the care of the President have developed into the army of the party and leader and the vanguard for carrying out the revolutionary cause of Songun under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean revolutionary armed forces, greatest patriotic heritage of the great leaders, have greeted the golden age of their development, demonstrating their might as a powerful elite revolutionary army possessed of H-bomb as it holds Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 They expressed their vows to fully display their responsibility and mission as the Korean women in the era of Songun in the gigantic struggle.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Meet
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Meet
 Samjiyon, February 5 (KCNA) -- School youth and children across the country held a meeting before leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp on Friday on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the mosaic depicting the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the secret camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Led by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, the participants took a pledge to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, remaining loyal to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants went round historic relics preserved at the historic birthplace with much care, being briefed on it.
					
					 During the study tour they went round the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, Chongbong and Konchang bivouacs, etc. and conducted colorful political and cultural work including a meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas read by them and a contest of singing revolutionary songs in chorus while marching in array.

articles.title: Quality Control Intensified in DPRK
articles.content:
Quality Control Intensified in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A campaign for improving quality control is going on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to Ko Nam Hyok, department director of the State Commission of Quality Management, steps have been taken to further improve the quality of goods this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.
					
					 Primary efforts were given to tightening quality control in the fields of power, coal, metallurgical and machine-building industries and rail transport.
					
					The Commission strives to update the measuring instruments and analytical equipment and conduct the control and technical test in a scientific way and ensure the quality of raw materials necessary for production.
					
					 Also, a brisk work goes on in food and consumer goods industries and light industry to standardize the quality of goods and establish a scientific quality control system based on the standards of quality control and warranty set by the International Organization for Standardization.
					
					 The Commission strongly urges various economic units and sectors to lead all their production processes and management activities to the quality improvement.
					
					 Meanwhile, such diverse events have been held as workshop and experience-sharing session for quality controllers and show of test measures.

articles.title: Production of Medicines and Medical Appliances Boosts in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Medicines and Medical Appliances Boosts in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Fresh upswing is being effected at factories under the Ministry of Public Health of the DPRK.
					 The production of medicines and medical appliances grew 140 percent as compared with the same period of last year, taking the ministry as a whole.
					
					 Pharmaceutical factories are increasing the production of penicillin, streptomycin, aspirin and other reserve medicines. 
					
					 Factories under the Koryo Medicine Production Management Bureau are steadily increasing the production of medicines in February, too after fulfilling production quota for January at 147 percent.
					
					 The workers of the factories under the Medical Appliance Industrial Management Bureau increased the production 149 percent as compared with the same period of last year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing about Great Successes in Agricultural Front
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing about Great Successes in Agricultural Front
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today in an editorial calls upon all officials and people to turn out as one in the drive for grain production including farming work, bearing deep in mind that farming at present is the struggle to defend the party, revolution and socialism.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to effect a great surge in the agricultural front to preserve the spirit of the Seventh Congress of the WPK, guarantee the future of the Korean revolution and lay the eternal foundation.
					
					 The officials and people in the field of agriculture are the frontline soldiers standing guard over the first line trench of the first echelon in defending socialism.
					
					 They should give full play to the working manner as befitting master as never before, bearing deep in mind that the key to increasing grain production and rich harvest depend on their mental power.
					
					 The provinces, cities and counties should launch a dynamic campaign for high yield, maintaining the principle of giving priority to self-development.
					
					 All fields and units should supply substantial fertilizers to the agricultural front.
					
					 The whole country should sincerely help the countryside.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all people to bring about successes in the agricultural front this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held and thus support the WPK with rice and glorify the history of golden fields.

articles.title: U.S. Disclosure of Video on Simulated Nuclear Bomb Explosion Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Disclosure of Video on Simulated Nuclear Bomb Explosion Denounced 
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the U.S. Department of Defense disclosed an animation file showing a simulated nuclear bomb explosion in the air above Seoul. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 After the disclosure of the animation file nuclear-phobia prevails in south Korea. 
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. made the DPRK's use of nuclear weapons against south Korea an established fact and on this basis conducted a test of a simulated nuclear bomb explosion and spread it. 
					
					 Up till now the DPRK has asserted its access to nuclear deterrence is a measure for self-defense. And it has never threatened to use a nuclear bomb against the south Korean people, fellow countrymen. 
					
					 However, American tricksters spread rumor that the DPRK's nuclear deterrence is targeting the south Koreans. 
					
					 Herein lies the U.S. sinister scenario to escalate inter-Korean confrontation and catch fish in troubled waters. In other words, it is trying to make the DPRK a poser of "nuclear threat" and make the south Korean people harbor hostility and sense of uneasiness towards the fellow countrymen in the north and justify its moves to bolster up the nuclear force. 
					
					 Now almost all the countries on the globe are exposed to the U.S. nuclear threats. 
					
					 The U.S. is just a barbarous state seeking the extinction of mankind and the only nuclear criminal state which should sit in the dock at a nuclear tribunal. The word of nuclear threat would not have appeared in the world, but for the U.S. appearance.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Revered by S. Korean Students
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Revered by S. Korean Students
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Students of Ulsan University of south Korea expressed their reverence for President Kim Il Sung after reading his reminiscences "With the Century", according to Yonhap News of south Korea on Feb. 3.
					 Giving their impressions of the reminiscences, they wrote "from the start, we are impressed by the genuine humanity of General Kim Il Sung" and "his reminiscences made us think of following the traits of General Kim Il Sung even a bit".
					
					 The students who wrote their impressions numbered more than 130 from November 2007 to June 2010.
					
					 Much upset by this, the security authorities indicted a professor of the university, accusing him of making the students write the impressions.
					
					 The Supreme Court at a trial on Feb. 3 sentenced him to six months in prison, six months of suspension of qualification and a one-year stay of execution.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' harsh crackdown can never block the mindset of the people following the great sun of the nation.

articles.title: New Party against Capitalists' Suppression and Plunder Organized in S. Korea
articles.content:
New Party against Capitalists' Suppression and Plunder Organized in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party for Reforming Society was inaugurated in Seoul on Jan. 31, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 A declaration was read out at the inaugural meeting.
					
					 It said that capital's wriggling threatens the lives of workers and the reactionary policy sweeps across the land of south Korea and workers are subject to discrimination and exclusion.
					
					 Noting that the Workers' Party for Reforming Society was inaugurated for carrying forward the tradition of the working class which has struggled against the capitalists' suppression and plunder, it stressed that the party would struggle for building society free from lay-off and part-time jobs and which guarantees the right to labor, well-being and democracy.
					
					 It said that the party would boost an urgent struggle for taking back the funds from the business giants and launch a workers' general strike for defending the people's right to existence.

articles.title: U.S. Aggressor Forces Create Danger of Nuclear Disaster
articles.content:
U.S. Aggressor Forces Create Danger of Nuclear Disaster
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that a fighter of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces caused an accident while staging a nuclear attack drill against the DPRK, creating the danger of a nuclear disaster.
					 Newsis of south Korea on Feb. 1 said this, quoting a report of the Japanese Asahi Shimbun.
					
					 It was reported that a report of the U.S. Department of Defense and a document of the U.S. air force opened to the public by Asahi Shimbun record dozens of data on the dangerous accidents related to nuclear weapons between the 1950s and the 1980s.
					
					 Among them is the one in which a U.S. fighter which flew at the Osan U.S. air force base in south Korea was put in flames while staging a drill for dropping nuclear bombs in January 1959, leaving part of the bombs dissolved and detonating device burnt away.
					
					 It was said that part carrying nuclear materials was separated from a nuclear bomb.
					
					 The paper said that the U.S. was making preparations for carrying nuclear materials anytime, ready for nuclear attack at the Osan U.S. air force base in the 1950s.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried by Bulgarian Organization in Its Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried by Bulgarian Organization in Its Bulletin
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was carried by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in the February issue of its bulletin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Bulgarian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association published the February issue of its bulletin.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The birth anniversary of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il" said that he applied his original Songun politics to all fields at a time when the imperialists were getting more frantic in their moves for undermining Korean socialism by taking advantages of the collapse of socialism in some countries.
					
					 Thanks to his leadership, socialism was defended, a turning phase was opened in building a thriving nation and the DPRK could emerge a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state, the bulletin said.
					
					 It noted that thanks to his patriotic bold decision, the north-south summit was held in June, 2000 for the first time in the history of national division, resulting in adopting the June 15 joint declaration, and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, was published in 2007.
					
					 It said that he most successfully solved all matters arising in leading the party, state and army and firmly defended Korean-style socialism despite the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' persistent pressure and threat.
					
					 It carried the full text of the statement issued by the DPRK government as regards the successful first H-bomb test of Juche Korea and introduced successes made by the Korean sportspersons in international games last year.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened in Sakhalin Region, Russia on Jan. 28 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works and books on their greatness, books and photos introducing the DPRK and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were personages of various circles and other masses in Sakhalin Region.
					
					 The minister of Culture of the Sakhalin Regional Administration said in a speech that he was pleased to see the opening of the Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition, and the exhibition would greatly contribute to developing the cultural exchange between the two countries.
					
					 The curator of a fine art museum in the region said that he was struck with admiration at the speed of the DPRK in which modern structures are being built in a short span of time.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Britain
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Britain
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in London on Jan. 30 under the co-sponsorship of the New Communist Party of Britain, British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were works of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said that the DPRK's successful first H-bomb test is the victory of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives and it would be unthinkable without the exploits of Kim Jong Il who bolstered up the country's military muscle with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said that going beyond the imagination of mankind are the ideological and theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il who provided the philosophical principle of the Juche idea and all guidelines to be maintained by the party, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Shawn Pikford, secretary general of the Korean Friendship Association UK, noted that the DPRK opted for having access to the nuclear deterrent for self-defense against the U.S. attempt to mount a nuclear attack.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean film "2015 for Sports Powerhouse".

articles.title: Greetings to DPRK Mission in Kinshasa
articles.content:
Greetings to DPRK Mission in Kinshasa
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Youth Union of the Popular Revolutionary Party of DR Congo sent a congratulatory message to the DPRK mission in Kinshasa on January 28.
					 The message warmly congratulated the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, adding that the youth league hardens the will of the youth organization of DR Congo to aspire after socialism and wage a vigorous struggle for realizing the common purpose.
					
					 We will strengthen support and solidarity, cooperation and exchange with the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League in view of the importance of the work for educating and uniting youths in the struggle for embodying the socialist idea and in view of the duty of the Youth Union of the Popular Revolutionary Party of DR Congo struggling to defend the national right of the people and build a righteous new society, the message said.

articles.title: RPDC intensifica labores de control de calidad
articles.content:
RPDC intensifica labores de control de calidad
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- Desde los primeros dias de este ano que se celebrara el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se intensifica el control de calidad en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun Ko Nam Hyok, jefe de la direccion del Comite Estatal de Control de la Calidad, se toman las medidas para mejorar la calidad de los articulos.
					
					Prestan la primordial atencion al control de calidad en las industrias electrica, carbonifera y metalurgica y de maquinaria y en el transporte ferroviario.
					
					Estructuran las labores para modernizar los medios de medida y medicion y las instalaciones de analisis, realizar de manera cientifica y tecnica el control y la inspeccion tecnica y asegurar las materias y las anexas necesarias para la produccion.
					
					Las ramas de la industria alimentaria y de articulos de uso diario y la industria ligera libran los trabajos para unificar la calidad de los articulos con la norma y la calidad de las muestras y para establecer el sistema cientifico de control de calidad a base de las normas tomadas por ISO.
					
					Varios dominios y unidades de la economia nacional presentan la demanda energica de prestar toda la atencion al mejoramiento de la calidad en todos los procesos y todas las actividades administrativas desde el desarrollo de nuevo articulo y produccion hasta la venta y garantia de calidad.
					
					Por otra parte, se realizan diversas labores entre otras el cursillo y seminario de experiencias para los inspectores de calidad y la exposicion de medios de inspeccion.

articles.title: Acto de presentacion sobre nobles virtudes de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Acto de presentacion sobre nobles virtudes de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 8 de febrero, dia de nacimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 5 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto de presentacion de nobles virtudes del Presidente Kim Il Sung de las funcionarias y las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC).
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Jong Sun, presidenta del Comite Central de la UMDC, las funcionarias y las integrantes de la misma organizacion en esta capital.
					
					  Las oradores subrayaron que el nacimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares en el 8 de febrero del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche, fue un evento significativo que abrio un nuevo motivo de viraje de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias iniciadas en el monte Paektu.
					
					  Destacaron que el espiritu revolucionario de apoyarse en sus propias fuerzas infundido por el Presidente hizo preparar la firme garantia que permite materializar con brillantez la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					
					  Recordaron que bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el EPC, crecido como las invencibles fuerzas armadas regulares en el seno del Presidente Kim Il Sung, se fortalecio y se desarrollo como el ejercito del partido y el lider y el destacamento de vanguardia del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun.
					
					  Senalaron que hoy dia, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea, maxima herencia patriotica de los grades lideres, acogieron la era de prosperidad de su desarrollo manifestando el aspecto majestuoso del ejercito de flor y nata de un pais poseedor hasta de la bomba de hidrogeno al gozar de la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  Expresaron la decision de cumplir con el deber asumido como mujeres coreanas de la epoca del Songun en la lucha d hoy.

articles.title: Efectuado mitin de juramento de jovenes y ninos escolares
articles.content:
Efectuado mitin de juramento de jovenes y ninos escolares
Samjiyon, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar el dia 5 frente a su casa natal en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu el mitin de juramento de los jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais.
					Los participantes rindieron tributo los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y a la Heroina Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk tras depositar cestos y ramos de flores ante el mural de mosaicos con sus imagenes.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion los funcionarios de la rama interesada y los miembros del grupo del recorrido de los jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais hacia la casa natal del Dirigente en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu 
					
					Siguiendo la voz guia de Jon Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los participantes juraron llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche apoyando con fidelidad la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes pasaron revista a los vestigios conservados en la casa natal escuchando las  explicaciones concernientes.
					
					Con anterioridad, recorrieron el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Ri Myong Su, los campamentos de Chongbong y Konchang, etc. y sostuvieron diversas labores politicos y culturales tales como el cenaculo de presentacion de reminiscencias de los guerrilleros antijaponeses y el concurso del coro en marcha.
